channel.title: Poetry on Obsidian
channel.description: Recent content in Poetry on Obsidian

item.title: Apr 12
item.description: Prompt: Write a short poem about spring Apr 12 [!tldr] Apr 12 TLDR Text is too short to sumarize In the early morning light, A world of new beginnings awake, Golden buds bursting forth from earth, Sparkling like stars in the sky above. The air is fragrant with blooms and breeze, Whispering secrets of new life’s growth, A symphony of sound, echoes through the forest, A melody that will carry for years to come.
